name: Ski Challenge 2013
summary: Ski Challenge 2013 is the 9th edition of the alpine skiing series Ski Challenge. The game includes the famous alpine downhill tracks of Bormio, Val Gardena, Kitzbühel, Wengen, Val-d’Isère, Garmisch-Partenkirchen, Beaver Creek and for the first time Schladming. The goal for the players is to climb the leaderboards by getting the fastest times. Three day events were held on each track to determine race winners who would win physical prizes.
